author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Indata: Bank Fills In Blanco Note Of Exchange For 3.6 Mln Zlotys
text:
May 28 (Reuters) - INDATA SA:
* SAID ON FRIDAY IT RECEIVED FROM MILLENNIUM BANK SA INFORMATION ABOUT FILLING AN IN BLANCO NOTE OF EXCHANGE ISSUED BY CO FOR AMOUNT OF 3.6 MILLION ZLOTYS
* ABOVE-MENTIONED IN BLANCO NOTE WAS ISSUED TO SECURE COMPANYâ€™S PAYABLES RESULTING FROM LOAN AGREEMENT SIGNED WITH BANK ON DEC. 9, 2018
* DATE OF PAYMENT OF THE NOTE OF EXCHANGE IS MAY 30, 2018 Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
